translation.guade_choose_content: Fantasy tournament is based on real world tournament event like LCL, LPL, LCS, etc. You can choose tournament which you like the most. Or you can create your own tournament.
translation.guade_create_content: You have to choose 5 players in order to create your fantasy team. Try to choose players which are the best in particular tournament.
translation.guade_win_content: After fantasy tournament is over, we’re calculating players results and finding a winner! So be the one and earn money!
translation.name: Name
translation.user_not_participated: This user has not yet participated in tournaments
translation.zero_tournaments: This user has not yet participated in tournaments
translation.join_tournament_and: Join Tournament and choose your champions
translation.youve_been_registered_for_the_tournament: You"ve been registered for the tournament
translation.free_tournament: Do you want to start with such a team?
translation.player_alreadt: This player is already taking part in the tournament
translation.want_delete_tournament: Do you really want to delete the tournament?
translation.want_remove_champion: Do you really want to remove the champion?
translation.want_remove_rule: Do you really want to remove the rule?
translation.really_want_create: Do you really want to create a tournament?
translation.match_add_player_error: Please, add players to the tournament first
translation.fantasy_tournament_is_over: Hey! Fantasy tournament is over! Check who is the winner!
translation.fantasy_tournament_is_over_winner: Congratulations! You are the winner of the Fantasy tournament!
translation.match_status_changed: Hey! It seems one of the matches is over! You can check it out!
translation.fields_required: Fields name and position are required
translation.name_contain: Name can not contain more than 20 characters
translation.you_not_chosen: You haven"t chosen any players yet
translation.match_field: Match field can not be empty
translation.date_field: Date field can not be empty
translation.name_entry_empty: Name and entry fields can not be empty
translation.fantasy_is: Fantasy League is a game that where each of you forms teams made up of pro players to compete against each other, earning points for your team based on how each of your pro players performs in tournament matches.
translation.tournament_players_content_1: Our Fantasy Tournaments are based on the most popular League of Legeds tournaments such as LPL, LCK, LCS
translation.tournament_players_content_2: You can choose betwen more than 200+ real players to be the part of your fantasy team
translation.unauthenticated_tournament_join: You have to sign in to participate in the tournament
translation.no_rewards: You haven"t received any rewards yet
translation.creator: Creator
translation.link_was_copy: Link was copy to your clipboard
translation.streamer_cant_make_forecast: You can not make forecast because you are a tournament creator
translation.summoner_cant_make_forecast: You can not make forecast because you are the one of the tournament summoners

home.under_title: Where streamers and viewers play together
home.card_1_title: Pick.gg is a toolbox for streamers looking to engage and grow their audience in a whole new way.
home.card_2_title: Streamers create tournaments with viewers or other streamers and choose prizes for the audience.
home.card_3_title: Viewers pick a team they think will get the most points for a small fee.
home.card_2_undertitle: Tournaments ruleset and player info provide an insight into winning conditions.
home.card_3_undertitle: Teams do not have to be the same as actual line-ups, you're free to choose whoever you think will do best. The fee is determined by the streamer.
home.card_4_undertitle: Get cool stuff for your favorite games at fraction of the cost. All while competing against other people watching! Get better and earn even more rewards.
home.footer_undertitle_1: Pick.gg was created with an idea of more rewarding participation in steams than just donations. We want to help streamers grow and make their passion a full-time occupation and we know the struggle is real.
home.footer_undertitle_2: The pool fees are shared with streamers, so you are directly supporting the person you watch while getting skins, in-game items, and in-game currencies for it!
